text: And thrust your hand the right one meaning the palm into your flank — that is your left side below the arm into the armpit and then take it out — it will emerge white in contrast to the skin-colour that it was without any fault that is without any sign of leprosy radiating like the rays of the sun blinding to the eyes of onlookers. That is yet another sign āyatan ukhrā this together with baydā’a ‘white’ constitute two circumstantial qualifiers referring to the subject of the verb takhruj ‘it will emerge’.
